title: Describe a problem you experienced on public transportation.

korean: 작년 여름에 지하철에 갇혔던 적이 있어요.
퇴근 시간이었는데 갑자기 전동차가 터널 안에서 멈춘 거예요.
처음에는 금방 다시 출발할 줄 알았거든요.
근데 10분, 20분 지나도 계속 서 있는 거예요.
에어컨도 제대로 안 나오고 사람들은 꽉 차 있고.
안내 방송도 별로 없어서 뭐가 문제인지도 모르겠고.
결국 40분 정도 있다가 겨우 다음 역으로 이동했어요.
그 이후로는 중요한 약속 있으면 일찍 출발해요.
대중교통도 완벽하진 않으니까 여유 시간을 두는 게 좋더라고요.
english: Last summer, I got stuck on the subway.
It was during evening rush hour when suddenly the train stopped in the tunnel.
At first, I thought we'd start moving again soon, you know.
But 10 minutes, 20 minutes passed and we were still stopped.
The air conditioning wasn't working properly and the car was packed with people.
It was really stuffy and hard to breathe.
There weren't many announcements either, so I didn't even know what the problem was.
Finally, after about 40 minutes, we barely made it to the next station.
They said there was a problem with the signal system.
I was really late for my appointment that day.
Since then, when I have important appointments, I leave early.
Public transportation isn't perfect either, so it's better to give yourself extra time.
